headline: California American Water Announces New Southern California Principal of Business Development
summary: SAN DIEGO, August 26, 2025--California American Water is pleased to announce that Glen Becerra has joined the company as Principal of Business Development for Southern California.

raw.headline: California American Water Announces New Southern California Principal of Business Development
raw.summary: SAN DIEGO, August 26, 2025--California American Water is pleased to announce that Glen Becerra has joined the company as Principal of Business Development for Southern California.

headline: Power, Policy, Progress: American Water EVP and COO Cheryl Norton Speaks at Women’s Energy Summit
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., August 26, 2025--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., sponsored and joined leaders in energy, investment and policy at the 2025 Women’s Energy Summit (WES), held August 26 in Chicago, Illinois. Cheryl Norton, Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer of American Water, spoke on the panel "Powering the Future: Financial and Policy Insights on Energy Innovation."

headline: Jerseyville Splash Pad Opens in Partnership with American Water Charitable Foundation & Illinois American Water
summary: BELLEVILLE, Ill., August 26, 2025--The City of Jerseyville, in partnership with American Water Charitable Foundation and Illinois American Water, open the new community splash pad.
